{"id":778970661,"lang":"cpp","time":"5 days, 1 hour","timestamp":1661041086,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/778970661/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int left =0;\n        int right = 0 ;\n        map <char ,int> m;\n        int maxsize =1 ;\n        while(right <s.size()){\n              char ch = s[right];\n            if(m[ch]>0){\n                maxsize = max(maxsize ,right-left);\n                left = m[ch];\n            }\n            right++;\n            ++m[s[right]];\n        }\n        return maxsize -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
